meanings.definition: A plural form of the word 'thou', meaning 'you'.
meanings.sent1: Can thous help me with this task?
meanings.sent2: I saw thous waiting at the bus stop.
meanings.sent3: Thous at the party were all dancing together.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with thous of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: Thous in the crowd cheered loudly for their team.

meanings.definition: A plural form of the word 'thou', used as a noun to refer to a large number or amount.
meanings.sent1: There were thous of stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with thous of shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The chef needed to prepare food for thous of guests.
meanings.sent4: The library contained thous of books on various subjects.
meanings.sent5: Thous of leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.
